# Onis
Large, horned people that come in a variety of colors. Their accuracy with guns is terrible, but their physical strength brings them a lot of boons both in and out of combat.
## Diet - Nothing special.
## Benefits - [color=#1e90ff]Takes 15% less Blunt, Slash and Piercing damage.[/color] - Does more damage in melee; [color=red]35% more Blunt and Asphyxiation, 20% more Slash and Piercing.[/color] - Due to their big size, they can easily carry, shove and pull any other morphotype. - [color=#1e90ff]They are harder to shove.[/color] - Slightly more stamina than Humans. - They have an easier time prying open doors, taking [color=#1e90ff]around 50% less time than other species.[/color]
## Drawbacks - [color=red]Their accuracy with guns is terrible.[/color] - They are harder to carry and pull. - They are bigger than Humans, making them easier to hit.
